raft.jpct.bones
Class Joint

java.lang.Object
  raft.jpct.bones.Joint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Joint
extends Object
implements Serializable

A Joint in a Skeleton. A Joint essentially consists of an Invert Bind Pose matrix and a parent id.

This class is adapted from Ardor3D.

See Also:
Serialized Form

          Parent index of a joint which has no parent

Field Detail

NO_PARENT

public static final int NO_PARENT
Parent index of a joint which has no parent

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Joint

public Joint(Matrix inverseBindPose,
             int index,
             int parentIndex,
             String name)

Creates a new Joint.

Parameters:
inverseBindPose - the inverse bind pose matrix
index - the intended index in skeleton
parentIndex - index of parent joint or NO_PARENT if has no parent. if has a parent, parent index should be less than joint's index
name - name of this joint. maybe null
Method Detail

getInverseBindPose

public Matrix getInverseBindPose()
Returns a copy of invertBindPose matrix

public Matrix getBindPose()
Returns a copy bindPose matrix.

getIndex

public int getIndex()
Returns the index of this joint.

getParentIndex

public int getParentIndex()
Returns the index of parent of this joint. Or NO_PARENT if this joint has no parent.

getName

public String getName()
Returns name of this joint.

hasParent

public boolean hasParent()
Returns true if this joint has a parent.
